description: iPhone photography, or iphoneography, has gained the attention of photographers ranging from casual amateur to professional. This course will guide you through the features of the native Camera app in the iOS, as well as some of the more popular apps for capturing and editing images. Award winning photographer, educator and photosynthesist, Dr. Carol Fox Henrichs, leads you through the step-by-step lessons, in which the topics covered include technical specs of the iPhone camera, using the native Camera App, added camera features, adding special effects, and sharing photos in the private Flickr group for the course. After completing this course you will be able to express your creativity and photographic style using your iPhone.You will also have an opportunity to continue to interact with your instructor and other iphoneographers via our Flickr group!
title: The Art of iPhoneography: Part 1
